titles: The declaration of Mr. Alexander Henderson, principall minister of the word of God at Edenbrough, and chiefe commissioner from the Kirk of Scotland to the Parliament and Synod of England: made upon his death-bed.
author: Henderson, Alexander, 1583?-1646.
notes: The first leaf features patristic and Biblical passages.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Solemn League and Covenant (1643) --  Early works to 1800.
